channel.title: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament
channel.description: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament

item.title: Opinion Poll by Sifo for Svenska Dagbladet, 5–15 March 2018 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Sveriges socialdemokratiska arbetareparti (S&D): 28.1–29.9%
  • Moderata samlingspartiet (EPP): 22.3–24.0%
  • Sverigedemokraterna (EFDD): 15.2–16.6%
  • Miljöpartiet de gröna (Greens/EFA): 3.4–4.2%
  • Centerpartiet (ALDE): 9.4–10.6%
  • Vänsterpartiet (GUE/NGL): 7.2–8.3%
  • Liberalerna (ALDE): 4.0–4.8%
  • Kristdemokraterna (EPP): 2.7–3.4%
  • Feministiskt initiativ (S&D): 1.6–2.1%

item.title: Opinion Poll by Sentio for Nyheter Idag, 8–14 March 2018 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Sveriges socialdemokratiska arbetareparti (S&D): 21.6–27.8%
  • Moderata samlingspartiet (EPP): 16.8–22.5%
  • Sverigedemokraterna (EFDD): 20.1–26.1%
  • Miljöpartiet de gröna (Greens/EFA): 3.4–6.5%
  • Centerpartiet (ALDE): 4.9–8.4%
  • Vänsterpartiet (GUE/NGL): 6.3–10.2%
  • Liberalerna (ALDE): 2.7–5.5%
  • Kristdemokraterna (EPP): 3.5–6.6%
  • Feministiskt initiativ (S&D): 1.2–3.3%

item.title: Opinion Poll by Demoskop for Expressen, 27 February–7 March 2018 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Sveriges socialdemokratiska arbetareparti (S&D): 25.1–29.4%
  • Moderata samlingspartiet (EPP): 19.8–23.9%
  • Sverigedemokraterna (EFDD): 16.8–20.6%
  • Miljöpartiet de gröna (Greens/EFA): 3.7–5.8%
  • Centerpartiet (ALDE): 6.7–9.3%
  • Vänsterpartiet (GUE/NGL): 7.3–10.0%
  • Liberalerna (ALDE): 4.1–6.3%
  • Kristdemokraterna (EPP): 2.5–4.3%
  • Feministiskt initiativ (S&D): 1.2–2.6%

item.title: Opinion Poll by Inizio for Aftonbladet, 1–5 March 2018 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Sveriges socialdemokratiska arbetareparti (S&D): 24.7–28.3%
  • Moderata samlingspartiet (EPP): 22.8–26.3%
  • Sverigedemokraterna (EFDD): 14.3–17.3%
  • Miljöpartiet de gröna (Greens/EFA): 2.7–4.1%
  • Centerpartiet (ALDE): 7.7–10.0%
  • Vänsterpartiet (GUE/NGL): 5.9–8.0%
  • Liberalerna (ALDE): 2.9–4.5%
  • Kristdemokraterna (EPP): 5.0–6.9%
  • Feministiskt initiativ (S&D): 2.0–3.3%
